 2014-13402014-11-27,  ,  PS,  , 
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisReappointment of HOWARD M. BRUCE of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Parole Board of Canada to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of HOWARD M. BRUCE to be a full-time member of the Appeal Division of the Parole Board of Canada; effective March 26, 2015.
